page.title: 05Mrs.J Hawkins Pt 2
page.content: After work I go shopping,usually in the Asda Supermarket.I arrive home about 2.30.After making the beds and having a quick tidy round,I prepare the evening meal.On a Monday I use the meat left over from Sunday and make a sort of hot-pot with vegetables and potatoes.This cooks for 2 hours in the oven.Pudding on a Monday is normally apple pie or crumble.I meet the children from school at 3.35 again with Toby.We have tea about 5.30. Afterwards,if i'm lucky,one of my daughters helps to wash up!Then I usually sit down for a rest.I like to watch "Coronation Street"on a Monday. About 8.00 I get the girls their supper,usually fruit and biscuits,and at about 9.00 they go to bed.Then I do some ironing,read a book,a newspaper, or watch T.V.About 11.30 I go to bed, usually tired out!
